purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of layout templates for layered electrical design where the templates provide a specific function in the design. The templates may be predefined and stored in a library.

inscope.li: items within the scope of application module Extended geometric tolerance, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1666;
items within the scope of application module Fabrication technology, ISO/CD-TS 10303-1670;
items within the scope of application module Functional usage view, ISO/CD-TS 10303-xxxx.
